Ruby on Rails v3.0.3
Class
ActionDispatch::TestResponse
In: actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/testing/test_response.rb:
Parent: ActionDispatch::Response

Integration test methods such as ActionDispatch::Integration::Session#get and ActionDispatch::Integration::Session#post return objects of class TestResponse, which represent the HTTP response results of the requested controller actions.

See Response for more information on controller response objects.

Methods
  • client_error?
  • error?
  • from_response
  • missing?
  • redirect?
  • success?
Included Modules
  • DeprecatedHelpers

      # File actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/testing/test_response.rb, line 9
 9:     def self.from_response(response)
10:       new.tap do |resp|
11:         resp.status  = response.status
12:         resp.headers = response.headers
13:         resp.body    = response.body
14:       end
15:     end
